verses.verse: בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֡וא <WH1931> he שָׁלַ֡ח <WH7971> sent מְרֹדַ֣ךְ בַּ֠לְאֲדָן <WH4757> Merodachbaladan בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son בַּלְאֲדָ֧ן <WH1081> of Baladan מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon סְפָרִ֥ים <WH5612> letters וּמִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> and a present אֶל־ <WH413> to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <WH2396> to Hezekiah וַיִּשְׁמַ֕ע <WH8085> for he had heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חָלָ֖ה <WH2470> that he had been sick וַֽיֶּחֱזָֽק׃ <WH2388> and was recovered

וַיִּשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> was glad עֲלֵיהֶם֮ <WH5921> and חִזְקִיָּהוּ֒ <WH2396> And Hezekiah וַיַּרְאֵ֣ם <WH7200> of them and shewed אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> them the house [נְכֹתָה כ] (נְכֹתֹ֡ו <WH5238> precious things ק) אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּסֶף֩ <WH3701> the silver וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּהָ֨ב <WH2091> and the gold וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּשָׂמִ֜ים <WH1314> and the spices וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> הַשֶּׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> ointment הַטּ֗וֹב <WH2896> and the precious וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and his whole בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and all the house כֵּלָ֔יו <WH3627> of his armour וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that was נִמְצָ֖א <WH4672> and all that was found בְּאֹֽצְרֹתָ֑יו <WH214> in his treasures לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> there was דָבָ֗ר <WH1697> there was nothing אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הֶרְאָ֧ם <WH7200> shewed חִזְקִיָּ֛הוּ <WH2396> that Hezekiah בְּבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> in his house וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4474> dominion

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> Then came יְשַׁעְיָ֣הוּ <WH3470> Isaiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> unto king חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אָמְר֣וּ ׀ <WH559> unto him What said הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH582> another הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these וּמֵאַ֙יִן֙ <WH370> where יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> came אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH2396> they unto thee? And Hezekiah מֵאֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> country רְחוֹקָ֛ה <WH7350> from a far בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> They are come אֵלַ֖י <WH413> from מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> unto me [even] from Babylon

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> Then said מָ֥ה <WH4100> What רָא֖וּ <WH7200> he What have they seen בְּבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> All that [is] in mine house וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered חִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> is in בְּבֵיתִי֙ <WH1004> house רָא֔וּ <WH7200> have they seen לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become דָבָ֛ר <WH1697> there is nothing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not הִרְאִיתִ֖ים <WH7200> that I have not shewed בְּאוֹצְרֹתָֽי׃ <WH214> among my treasures

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <WH3470> Isaiah אֶל־ <WH413> to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <WH2396> to Hezekiah שְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

הִנֵּה֮ <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> Behold the days בָּאִים֒ <WH935> come וְנִשָּׂ֣א ׀ <WH5375> shall be carried כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> is in בְּבֵיתֶ֗ךָ <WH1004> that all that [is] in thine house וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after אָצְר֧וּ <WH686> have laid up in store אֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1> and [that] which thy fathers עַד־ <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> until this day הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> to this בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> to Babylon לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִוָּתֵ֥ר <WH3498> shall be left דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> nothing אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וּמִבָּנֶ֜יךָ <WH1121> And of thy sons אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יֵצְא֧וּ <WH3318> that shall issue מִמְּךָ֛ <WH4480> at אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom תּוֹלִ֖יד <WH3205> from thee which thou shalt beget יִקָּ֑חוּ <WH3947> shall they take away וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> will become סָרִיסִ֔ים <WH5631> and they shall be eunuchs בְּהֵיכַ֖ל <WH1964> in the palace מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said חִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH2396> Hezekiah אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יְשַׁעְיָ֔הוּ <WH3470> to Isaiah ט֥וֹב <WH2896> Good דְּבַר־ <WH1697> [is] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבַּ֑רְתָּ <WH1696> which thou hast spoken וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> He said כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יִהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> become שָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> moreover For there shall be peace וֶאֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> and truth בְּיָמָֽי׃ <WH3117> in my days פ
